name: Blobbies' Lair
description:
This game ism eant to be played by 2 to 4 Players (with XBox360 controllers).

XBox Controller 360 mapping :

  • A = Dash
  • X = Shoot (Hold to charge)

You have 3 bullets and must be the last survivor.

Blobbies and bullets kill you instantly.

Blobbies keep spreading!!!
